unnormalised: Arre yaar, mhoje tailor-an maka ek shirt bodlunk ₹500 sanglle, karan mhaka 2 inches kamrek vaddle mhunn sangta! Hanv soput gheun sangtam, tem Diwali-che sweets asat, tache measuring tape nhoi.
normalised: Arre yaar, mhoje tailor-an eka shirt alterationak rupia panchshe sanglle, mhonnun maka gut'tut don inch potter vaddlo mhonn! Hanv shapath gheun sangta, tem Diwali-che goddshe, tache measuring tape nhoi.
text: Arre yaar, mhoje tailor-an maka ek shirt bodlunk ₹500 sanglle, karan mhaka 2 inches kamrek vaddle mhunn sangta! Hanv soput gheun sangtam, tem Diwali-che sweets asat, tache measuring tape nhoi.
